title: Author: Ancient Texts Argue For An Islamic Feminist Movement
teaser: Journalist Carla Power has been studying the Koran. NPR's Linda Wertheimer talks with her about her book, If Oceans Were Ink: An Unlikely Friendship and a Journey to the Heart of the Quran.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
